The '''Stone Crows''' are one of the [[Hill tribes]] that live in the [[Mountains of the Moon]]. They are led by [[Shagga]], and presumably by [[Dolf]] before him. They have weapons, but nothing compared to the Knights of the [[Vale]]. 

==[[Season 1]]==
The Stone Crows encounter [[Tyrion Lannister]] and [[Bronn]], who are returning from [[the Eyrie]] after Tyrion's [[First Trial of Tyrion Lannister|trial]] there. The tribes initially intend to kill them, but Tyrion talks them into an alliance with the [[House Lannister|Lannisters]] who, he says, are enemies of the Vale and will supply the hill tribes with money and weapons to take over the region themselves. They accompany Tyrion to his [[Tywin Lannister|father]]'s military camp, and he agrees to honor his son's promises to them.<ref>"[[The Pointy End]]"</ref> The tribes later take part in the victorious [[Battle of the Green Fork]].<ref>"[[Baelor]]"</ref>
